reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be a high-quality piece that fits nicely and isn't oversized, with a true white color that hasn't faded.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: I've been wanting a red sweater like this for a long time! I was pleasantly surprised it's 100% cotton. The fit is slim but it's not tight, it has quite a bit of stretch to it. It is mid-weight and it feels breathable which is refreshing for me because I run hot. It will keep you warm but not overly warm. If it's very cold it will probably be great with a long-sleeve layer under it. I'm 5'9", 135lbs. I usually wear a small to medium or 6 to 8 US in tops. This sweater is a Medium and plenty long. The sleeves are just right, I often have trouble with sleeves being too short as a tall girl. The bottom band of the sweater doesn't hug my hips like many tops that sit below the hips do. It also hides my "mommy tummy". FOR PEOPLE WITH SENSORY ISSUES: It's not scratchy but not super soft either. Having sensory issues, I can say that it's pretty comfortable. I only tried it on for a few minutes with a short sleeved tee on under. The texture on my arms bothered me a little but I will probably get used to it after a bit. If not, I can comfortably put a long sleeve layer under it since the sleeves aren't tight (but I do have skinny arms). We'll see how it does with wear and washing but so far I think it's fantastic! Read more
items.author: Iana Klenz Frederickson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I replaced ALL of my winter sweaters with these ....
items.body: I have been looking for this type of sweater for years ... and I mean more than a decade! COTTON (!!), soft, classic, midweight (heavy enough to look great after washing), relaxed fit, warm but NOT bulky. I go with X-Large so I can put a shirt underneath, but they’re NOT sloppy on their own. These sweaters are the quality I used to find at Talbot’s and Coldwater Creek. I finally gave up on wearing my winter sweaters because they were all too warm. I gave them away and replaced them with 'Amazon Essentials' sweaters. These launder well, but treat them with care. I go with a gentle cycle, cold, dried on 'extra low' for ONLY 10 minutes to get them started toward dry. Then dry flat, as recommended. This is quality merch, not something to throw in with jeans and other things with zippers!! I love the fact that I could find jewel tones as well as black. If you like pastels, they are here, too. Thanks for coming to my rescue, Amazon! Read more
items.author: K. York

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Fisherman Style Cable Sweater
items.body: I bought the incorrect sweater, and didn’t realize it until I cut the tag off to try it on. I had multiple tabs open in my iPad, and I had ordered another small cable knit sweater, which is also called Amazon Essentials Cable Knit Sweater. However that one says lightweight in the description and this one says fisherman. I like this, but I don’t love it, I wanted the oversized look, I plan on wearing them over long sleeve tee shirts, or long sleeve bodysuits in the fall winter. Amazon offers the same items with varying prices and I’m creating my fall and winter clothes collection as things go on sale. Fit: A little smaller than the other Amazon Essentials Lightweight Long Sleeve Cable Knit Sweater. Material: Heavier weight than the other sweater, definitely will be nice during winter. Color: Very pretty pale pink. I tried it on with khaki knee length stretchy jeans type of mini skirt, light jeans, dark jeans, and white jeans and it looks cute with everything. Also no evidence was left on my wide leg black dress pants after trying it on with those, so it is a nice quality sweater, that doesn’t appear to shed, especially if you get it on sale. Over all, I am happy, but not as happy as I am with the other sweater. My bad for not paying attention while ordering, but I’m taking off one star, because IMO it doesn’t fit like the other large, even though it’s big on me, it doesn’t give the same look or feel as the other sweater. I need to review that style as well, because I purchased 6 of that style, 3 medium and 3 large size, and I’m keeping all 6. Cute sweater, and if I only bought this one, I probably would love it, however since I already had bought and worn another style so recent, it’s v difficult not to compare them. Read more
items.author: Alyssa Hourglass

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic, natural fiber sweater
items.body: I got this sweater in both the dark green and the cream and love them both. Can’t beat the price for 100% cotton and they’re a good medium weight for layering. I’m usually a small/medium and got the medium and it fits true to size to me, but does stretch out after wearing all day so I think I could have gone with a small too and been fine. The dark green is really pretty with more of an evergreen/blue undertone. Will buy more! Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Very good quality sweater! It’s beautiful. First time trying it on, it was a little big on me; I washed and dried in dryer and it shrunk just enough to fit perfect! 100% cotton. It’s NOT a lightweight. Read more
items.author: sher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully Made Sweater!
items.body: This is a BEAUTIFUL, well made, thick, soft, cozy sweater! I purchased as a gift for my Mother. It has a nice heavy weight and she will be able to layer it perfectly. Love the fabric and the cable knit detail. A high end sweater at a very good price. I will buy more! Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good.
items.body: I’m disappointed in this one and I had high hopes after reading reviews. I like a longer sleeve and these were on the short side to short for me and didn’t fit right under the arm. I will say they are a good quality and medium weight. The pattern is also cute and just as pictured. I find they stretch to much just from trying it on. They would be good for layering a longer sweater sleeve shirt under for colder days and a tank top for more mild weather. All in all a good sweater if you don’t like a longer sleeve and mind the stretch. If you’re looking for a form fit you don’t get it with this sweater, but will get a comfortable looser fit in the body from them. I did send it back due to the few issues I had, but it might be great for you! Read more
items.author: MM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality – Cozy, Stylish, and Well-Made
items.body: These sweaters are fantastic! They fit really well, are warm and soft, and look much more expensive than they actually are. I’ve been impressed with how well they hold up in the wash—I lay them flat to dry, and they keep their shape beautifully. The colors are exactly what I was hoping for, and overall, the quality has exceeded my expectations. I’m very happy with this purchase and will likely order more! Read more
items.author: Vidal

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Chestnut Brown Heather, Taupe Heather, Camel Heather, Deep Green, Light Grey Heather, Dark Burgundy, Cream, Black, Sage Green Heather, Dark Red, Olive, Red, Navy, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
